stochastic_function: lambda weather_outcome: {'rain':0.9,'no rain':0.1} if weather_outcome == 'rain' else {'rain':0.1,'no rain':0.9}

lambda carry_umbrella_decision, weather_outcome: {0:0.0, -2:0.99, -10:0.01} if carry_umbrella_decision == 'carry' and weather_outcome == 'rain' else ({0:0.0, -2:1.0, -10:0.0} if carry_umbrella_decision == 'carry' and weather_outcome == 'no rain' else ({0:0.01, -2:0.0, -10:0.99} if carry_umbrella_decision == 'not carry' and weather_outcome == 'rain' else {0:1.0, -2:0.0, -10:0.0}))
